Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.god

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    God
    This interface represents the God for the decorator pattern
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicGod
    This is God concrete class which implements the basic moves of the workers and of the build
    BasicGodTest  
    BuildBeforeWorkerMove
    This class implements the ability to build before the worker move: you can build, move a worker at the same level or lower, and then build again.
    BuildBeforeWorkerMoveTest  
    BuildDome
    This class implements the ability to build a Dome everywhere even the player is not building at the fourth level
    BuildInTheSamePosition
    This class implements the ability to build twice in the same position
    BuildInTheSamePositionTest  
    DownTwoOrMoreLevelsWin
    This class implements the ability to win if the worker moves down two or more levels lower
    DownTwoOrMoreLevelsWinTest  
    GodDecorator
    This abstract class handles the different concrete decorators
    MoveBeforeBuild  
    MoveBeforeBuildTest  
    MoveTwice
    This class implements the possibility to move twice at the same turn
    MoveWorkerTwice
    This class implements the ability to move twice the same worker
    MoveWorkerTwiceTest  
    NotMoveUp
    This class implements the ability to not move up of the opponent workers
    NotMoveUpTest  
    OpponentBlock
    This class implements the ability to not allow to move up to the other players
    OpponentBlockTest  
    OtherPositionToBuild
    This class implements the ability to build twice in two different positions
    OtherPositionToBuildTest  
    ShiftWorker
    This class implements the ability to shift an opponent worker in a new position
    ShiftWorkerTest  
    SwitchWorker
    This class implements the ability to switch the position with an enemy worker
    SwitchWorkerTest
